code:
graph TD
    A[Education_LMS_Portal] --> B[Education_LMS_Portal]
    B --> C{Education_StudentDB}
    C -->|FileNotFoundError| D[Education_ContentCDN]
    C --> E{Education_ContentCDN}
    E -->|No| F[Education_LMS_Portal]
    F --> D
    E -->|Yes| G[Education_ContentCDN]
    G --> H{Education_ContentCDN}
    H -->|Yes| I[Education_LMS_Portal]
    H -->|No| J[Education_ContentCDN]
    I --> K[Education_ContentCDN]
    K --> L{Education_GradeSync}
    L -->|Yes| M[Education_ContentCDN]
    L -->|No| N[Education_ContentCDN]
    M --> O[Education_StudentDB]
    N --> O

    subgraph threat_vault_lookup
        G1[Education_StudentDB] --> G2[Education_ClassroomService]
        G2 --> G3{Education_GradeSync}
        G3 -->|Success| G4[Education_LMS_Portal]
        G3 -->|Error| G5[Education_ContentCDN]
        G4 -->|Success| G6[Education_StudentDB]
        G4 -->|Error| G7[Education_ContentCDN]
    end

    subgraph get_file_hashes
        C1[Education_StudentDB] --> C2{Education_ContentCDN}
        C2 -->|Yes| C3[Education_StudentDB]
        C3 --> C4{Education_StudentDB}
        C4 -->|File| C5[Education_ClassroomService]
        C5 --> C6[Education_GradeSync]
        C6 --> C4
        C4 -->|No more files| C7[Education_ContentCDN]
        C2 -->|No| C8[Education_ContentCDN]
        C8 --> C9[Education_StudentDB]
        C9 --> C10[Education_ContentCDN]
    end

    subgraph calculate_sha256
        A1[Education_ClassroomService] --> B1[Education_ClassroomService]
        B1 --> C1[Education_StudentDB]
        C1 --> D1{Education_LMS_Portal}
        D1 -->|Chunk read| E1[Education_ClassroomService]
        E1 --> D1
        D1 -->|End of file| F1[Education_ClassroomService]
        F1 --> G1[Education_ClassroomService]
        G1 --> H1[Education_ClassroomService]
    end
compilation_error: [WinError 2] 系统找不到指定的文件。
